start:
Hello! This Bot will make a clip (actually a slideshow) for your song, using the open image generating neural networks.

In order to start, we want you to answer some questions. You can answer them using the command "/set_network", "/set_artist", "/set_song".

You can start the process of creating a clip wit "/clip" command.
rudalle_choice: You have chosen ruDALL-E to handle your video clip
diffusion_choice: You have chosen Diffusion to handle your video clip
midjourney_choice: You have chosen MidJourney to handle your video clip
clip_command:
The clipping process has started.
Your place in the queue: NaN
